data.actual_result: You are able to type in the channel, but not able to send.
data.expected_result: You shouldnt be able to type in the channel.
data.short_description: When you click a link to a channel (i.e. #example) that you are unauthorized to type in, Discord allows you to type in the channel, but not send.
data.steps_to_repro: - Tap on a channel link that you are not authorized to type in - Type in the unauthorized channel
